name: Double Standard
description:
Take the place of a white-hat hacker who has chosen to deal with some dangerous men.Will he cheat his own morals to pay his debt?

Gameplay Programmer - Gökalp Çevik

Sound Design - Gökalp Çevik

UI/UX - Gökalp Çevik

Story Design - Gökalp Çevik

various sfx are from soundimage.org by Eric Matyas

"Hazy Disorientation" by Eric Matyas - soundimage.org

OS Bootup SFX from freesound.org
